name: Downwell
description: This Point of Interest is located on a planet or similar celestial body, and can only be accessed by vessels with the "lander" tag

name: Lander
description: This vessel is capable of landing on planets and similar celestial bodies.

name: Moorings
description: This Point of Interest will generate stabilized anchors where large vessels can safely moor.

name: Docking Capcaity
description: The maximum vessel size class this vessel or Point of Interest can accomidate in its docking facilities.

name: Solid State
description: This vessel does not carry human crew, and is entirely operated by one or more NHPs or sufficiently advanced expert systems.

name: Restricted
description: This Point of Interest will not allow any vessels within their nearspace that do not have the specified tag or type

name: Stevedores
description: This vessel is too large to dock at most stations and will deploy stevedore ships to facilitate cargo transfer

name: Drone Controller
description: This vessel will deploy mission-specific drones

name: Tenders
description: This vessel will deploy tenders to ferry personnel and cargo between nearby ships that have the specified tag or type

name: Escorts
description: This vessel is flanked by one or more support ships or strike craft wings

name: Fighter Bays
description: This vessel will deploy fighter wings
